ygData.subject: Re: ARK
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She hears him knocking at the door. Come on in, the doors open. She heard him say something about the holotraining.  She was in the mood for a fight.

::Spears::

She hears him knocking at the door. "Come on in, the doors open."
She heard him say something about the holotraining.  She was in the 
mood for a fight.  She stood up but left the spear on the bed.
"I could use something to calm down with."
She walked to the door and opened it.  She looked at Striker. She had 
a plain expression on her face. "I'm sorry I yelled."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker blinks as Spears slams the door in his face. She was 
obvioustly not 
> 'fine'. She looked and sounded far from it. He sighs. He should let 
her calm 
> down. Or... An idea occurs to him. Perhaps she can take her anger 
out on 
> him....
> 
> He knocks on the door again. "Hey, you still up for that holo-room 
training?"
